casebody.data:
BAYVIEW LOAN SERVICING, LLC, a foreign limited liability company registered in Nevada, Appellant,
v.
HOLM INTERNATIONAL PROPERTIES, LLC, a Utah limited liability company registered as a foreign limited liability company in Nevada; and Sunset Bay Condominium Owners Association, a Nevada domestic non-profit corporation, Respondents. No. 71715 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED FEBRUARY 15, 2018

AFFIRMED.
